title: How to copy a variable's value to the clipboard in Ghidra debugger
content:
When I hover over an array variable in a Ghidra debugging session, I get a pop-up that looks like this:

The pop-up is called a variable hover in the Ghidra documentation, which explains what all of the values mean. What I am most interested in is the 248 bytes that make up the array. How can I get those 248 bytes out of Ghidra and onto the clipboard to paste into another program for further analysis?

comments.text: Did you try to simply select the bytes with your mouse and use ctrl-C or the context menu to copy?
That's the first thing I tried. They're not selectable and there's no context menu.
